metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

connectorUiConfig.title: Bitwarden Event Logs
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: This connector provides insight into activity of your Bitwarden organization such as user's activity (logged in, changed password, 2fa, etc.), cipher activity (created, updated, deleted, shared, etc.), collection activity, organization activity, and more.

sampleQueries.name: Get sample of Bitwarden Event Logs
sampleQueries.description: Get sample of Bitwarden Event Logs

dataTypes.name: EventLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
BitwardenEventLogs_CL
 | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: Members
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
BitwardenMembers_CL
 | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: Groups
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
BitwardenGroups_CL
 | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

Read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key)

customs.name: Bitwarden Client Id and Client Secret
customs.description: Your API key can be found in the Bitwarden organization admin console. Please see [Bitwarden documentation](https://bitwarden.com/help/public-api/#authentication) for more information.

instructionSteps.description:
Your API key can be found in the Bitwarden organization admin console.
Please see [Bitwarden documentation](https://bitwarden.com/help/public-api/#authentication) for more information.
Self-hosted Bitwarden servers may need to reconfigure their installation's URL.
instructionSteps.title: Connect Bitwarden Event Logs to Microsoft Sentinel

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date/timestamp when the event occurred

columns.name: itemId
columns.description: The unique identifier of the event

columns.name: ipAddress
columns.description: The IP address of the acting user

dataFlows.transformKql: source | project TimeGenerated = todatetime(["date"]), eventType = type, itemId, collectionId, groupId, policyId, memberId, actingUserId, installationId, device, ipAddress
source | project TimeGenerated = now(), memberId = id, userId, email, name
source | project TimeGenerated = now(), groupId = id, name

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: itemId
columns.description: The unique identifier of the event

columns.name: ipAddress
columns.description: The IP address of the acting user

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

properties.query:
let deviceTypeNames = dynamic({
    "0": "Android",
    "1": "iOS",
    "2": "Chrome Extension",
    "3": "Firefox Extension",
    "4": "Opera Extension",
    "5": "Edge Extension",
    "6": "Windows Desktop",
    "7": "MacOs Desktop",
    "8": "Linux Desktop",
    "9": "Chrome Browser",
    "10": "Firefox Browser",
    "11": "Opera Browser",
    "12": "Edge Browser",
    "13": "IE Browser",
    "14": "Unknown Browser",
    "15": "Android Amazon",
    "16": "UWP",
    "17": "Safari Browser",
    "18": "Vivaldi Browser",
    "19": "Vivaldi Extension",
    "20": "Safari Extension",
    "21": "SDK",
    "22": "Server",
    "23": "Windows CLI",
    "24": "MacOs CLI",
    "25": "Linux CLI"
});
let eventTypeNames = dynamic({
  "1000": "User_LoggedIn",
  "1001": "User_ChangedPassword",
  "1002": "User_Updated2fa",
  "1003": "User_Disabled2fa",
  "1004": "User_Recovered2fa",
  "1005": "User_FailedLogIn",
  "1006": "User_FailedLogIn2fa",
  "1007": "User_ClientExportedVault",
  "1008": "User_UpdatedTempPassword",
  "1009": "User_MigratedKeyToKeyConnector",
  "1010": "User_RequestedDeviceApproval",
  "1100": "Cipher_Created",
  "1101": "Cipher_Updated",
  "1102": "Cipher_Deleted",
  "1103": "Cipher_AttachmentCreated",
  "1104": "Cipher_AttachmentDeleted",
  "1105": "Cipher_Shared",
  "1106": "Cipher_UpdatedCollections",
  "1107": "Cipher_ClientViewed",
  "1108": "Cipher_ClientToggledPasswordVisible",
  "1109": "Cipher_ClientToggledHiddenFieldVisible",
  "1110": "Cipher_ClientToggledCardCodeVisible",
  "1111": "Cipher_ClientCopiedPassword",
  "1112": "Cipher_ClientCopiedHiddenField",
  "1113": "Cipher_ClientCopiedCardCode",
  "1114": "Cipher_ClientAutofilled",
  "1115": "Cipher_SoftDeleted",
  "1116": "Cipher_Restored",
  "1117": "Cipher_ClientToggledCardNumberVisible",
  "1300": "Collection_Created",
  "1301": "Collection_Updated",
  "1302": "Collection_Deleted",
  "1400": "Group_Created",
  "1401": "Group_Updated",
  "1402": "Group_Deleted",
  "1500": "OrganizationUser_Invited",
  "1501": "OrganizationUser_Confirmed",
  "1502": "OrganizationUser_Updated",
  "1503": "OrganizationUser_Removed",
  "1504": "OrganizationUser_UpdatedGroups",
  "1505": "OrganizationUser_UnlinkedSso",
  "1506": "OrganizationUser_ResetPassword_Enroll",
  "1507": "OrganizationUser_ResetPassword_Withdraw",
  "1508": "OrganizationUser_AdminResetPassword",
  "1509": "OrganizationUser_ResetSsoLink",
  "1510": "OrganizationUser_FirstSsoLogin",
  "1511": "OrganizationUser_Revoked",
  "1512": "OrganizationUser_Restored",
  "1513": "OrganizationUser_ApprovedAuthRequest",
  "1514": "OrganizationUser_RejectedAuthRequest",
  "1600": "Organization_Updated",
  "1601": "Organization_PurgedVault",
  "1602": "Organization_ClientExportedVault",
  "1603": "Organization_VaultAccessed",
  "1604": "Organization_EnabledSso",
  "1605": "Organization_DisabledSso",
  "1606": "Organization_EnabledKeyConnector",
  "1607": "Organization_DisabledKeyConnector",
  "1608": "Organization_SponsorshipsSynced",
  "1609": "Organization_CollectionManagement_Updated",
  "1700": "Policy_Updated",
  "1800": "ProviderUser_Invited",
  "1801": "ProviderUser_Confirmed",
  "1802": "ProviderUser_Updated",
  "1803": "ProviderUser_Removed",
  "1900": "ProviderOrganization_Created",
  "1901": "ProviderOrganization_Added",
  "1902": "ProviderOrganization_Removed",
  "1903": "ProviderOrganization_VaultAccessed",
  "2000": "OrganizationDomain_Added",
  "2001": "OrganizationDomain_Removed",
  "2002": "OrganizationDomain_Verified",
  "2003": "OrganizationDomain_NotVerified",
  "2100": "Secret_Retrieved"
});
BitwardenEventLogs_CL
| extend deviceName = tostring(deviceTypeNames[tostring(device)])
| extend eventTypeName = tostring(eventTypeNames[tostring(eventType)])
| join kind = leftouter (BitwardenMembers_CL 
  | where userId != '' 
  | distinct userId, name, email 
  | project actingUserId2=userId, actingUserName=name, actingUserEmail=email) on $left.actingUserId == $right.actingUserId2
| project-away actingUserId2
| join kind = leftouter (BitwardenMembers_CL 
  | distinct memberId, name, email 
  | project memberId2=memberId, memberUserName=name, memberUserEmail=email) on $left.memberId == $right.memberId2
| project-away memberId2
| join kind = leftouter (BitwardenGroups_CL 
  | distinct groupId, name 
  | project groupId2=groupId, groupName=name) on $left.groupId == $right.groupId2
| project-away groupId2

    "23": "Windows CLI",
    "24": "MacOs CLI",
    "25": "Linux CLI"
});
let eventTypeNames = dynamic({
  "1000": "User_LoggedIn",
  "1001": "User_ChangedPassword",
  "1002": "User_Updated2fa",
  "1003": "User_Disabled2fa",
  "1004": "User_Recovered2fa",
  "1005": "User_FailedLogIn",
  "1006": "User_FailedLogIn2fa",
  "1007": "User_ClientExportedVault",
  "1008": "User_UpdatedTempPassword",
  "1009": "User_MigratedKeyToKeyConnector",
  "1010": "User_RequestedDeviceApproval",
  "1100": "Cipher_Created",
  "1101": "Cipher_Updated",
  "1102": "Cipher_Deleted",
  "1103": "Cipher_AttachmentCreated",
  "1104": "Cipher_AttachmentDeleted",
  "1105": "Cipher_Shared",
  "1106": "Cipher_UpdatedCollections",
  "1107": "Cipher_ClientViewed",
  "1108": "Cipher_ClientToggledPasswordVisible",
  "1109": "Cipher_ClientToggledHiddenFieldVisible",
  "1110": "Cipher_ClientToggledCardCodeVisible",
  "1111": "Cipher_ClientCopiedPassword",
  "1112": "Cipher_ClientCopiedHiddenField",
  "1113": "Cipher_ClientCopiedCardCode",
  "1114": "Cipher_ClientAutofilled",
  "1115": "Cipher_SoftDeleted",
  "1116": "Cipher_Restored",
  "1117": "Cipher_ClientToggledCardNumberVisible",
  "1300": "Collection_Created",
  "1301": "Collection_Updated",
  "1302": "Collection_Deleted",
  "1400": "Group_Created",
  "1401": "Group_Updated",
  "1402": "Group_Deleted",
  "1500": "OrganizationUser_Invited",
  "1501": "OrganizationUser_Confirmed",
  "1502": "OrganizationUser_Updated",
  "1503": "OrganizationUser_Removed",
  "1504": "OrganizationUser_UpdatedGroups",
  "1505": "OrganizationUser_UnlinkedSso",
  "1506": "OrganizationUser_ResetPassword_Enroll",
  "1507": "OrganizationUser_ResetPassword_Withdraw",
  "1508": "OrganizationUser_AdminResetPassword",
  "1509": "OrganizationUser_ResetSsoLink",
  "1510": "OrganizationUser_FirstSsoLogin",
  "1511": "OrganizationUser_Revoked",
  "1512": "OrganizationUser_Restored",
  "1513": "OrganizationUser_ApprovedAuthRequest",
  "1514": "OrganizationUser_RejectedAuthRequest",
  "1600": "Organization_Updated",
  "1601": "Organization_PurgedVault",
  "1602": "Organization_ClientExportedVault",
  "1603": "Organization_VaultAccessed",
  "1604": "Organization_EnabledSso",
  "1605": "Organization_DisabledSso",
  "1606": "Organization_EnabledKeyConnector",
  "1607": "Organization_DisabledKeyConnector",
  "1608": "Organization_SponsorshipsSynced",
  "1609": "Organization_CollectionManagement_Updated",
  "1700": "Policy_Updated",
  "1800": "ProviderUser_Invited",
  "1801": "ProviderUser_Confirmed",
  "1802": "ProviderUser_Updated",
  "1803": "ProviderUser_Removed",
  "1900": "ProviderOrganization_Created",
  "1901": "ProviderOrganization_Added",
  "1902": "ProviderOrganization_Removed",
  "1903": "ProviderOrganization_VaultAccessed",
  "2000": "OrganizationDomain_Added",
  "2001": "OrganizationDomain_Removed",
  "2002": "OrganizationDomain_Verified",
  "2003": "OrganizationDomain_NotVerified",
  "2100": "Secret_Retrieved"
});
BitwardenEventLogs_CL
| extend deviceName = tostring(deviceTypeNames[tostring(device)])
| extend eventTypeName = tostring(eventTypeNames[tostring(eventType)])
| join kind = leftouter (BitwardenMembers_CL 
  | where userId != '' 
  | distinct userId, name, email 
  | project actingUserId2=userId, actingUserName=name, actingUserEmail=email) on $left.actingUserId == $right.actingUserId2
| project-away actingUserId2
| join kind = leftouter (BitwardenMembers_CL 
  | distinct memberId, name, email 
  | project memberId2=memberId, memberUserName=name, memberUserEmail=email) on $left.memberId == $right.memberId2
| project-away memberId2
| join kind = leftouter (BitwardenGroups_CL 
  | distinct groupId, name 
  | project groupId2=groupId, groupName=name) on $left.groupId == $right.groupId2
| project-away groupId2

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

Review the solution Release Notes

There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

This application provides insight into activity of your Bitwarden organization such as user's activity (logged in, changed password, 2fa, etc.), cipher activity (created, updated, deleted, shared, etc.), collection activity, organization activity, and more.

Data Connectors: 1, Parsers: 1, Workbooks: 3

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
